content: *twyla is a smart cardigan that fastens with a single button in softwist berroco * berocco info skill level experienced finished measurements bust closed 32 36-40-44-48 length 20 1/2 20 1/2 - 21 - 21 1/2 - 22 materials berroco softwist 50 grs * discontinued * 14 15-17-20-22 hanks #9415 pilaster alternate yarn berroco ultra alpaca 100 grs 7 7-8-10-11 hanks crochet hook size 5 50 mm i or size to obtain gauge one 1 3/4 button knit & crochet info **skill level** intermediate **finished sizes** instructions given fit size x-small changes for sizes small medium large and x-large are in **finished measurement** **bust closed ** 32 inches x-small 36 inches small 40 inches medium 44 inches large 48 inches x-large **length ** 20 1/2 inches x-small 20 1/2 inches small 21 inches medium 21 1/2 inches large 22 inches x-large **materials** * berroco comfort medium worsted weight acrylic/nylon yarn 3 1/2 oz/210 yds/100g per skein 7 7 8 10 11 skeins #9776 fern * size i/9/5 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * 3/4-inch button * tapestry needle **gauge** **working in pattern ** 8 cluster = 4 inches 9 row = 4 inches take time to check gauge gauge 8 clusters = 4 9 row = 4 in cluster pat with size 5 50 mm i crochet hook to save time take time to check gauge schematics are provided also at annie s 1 1 https //www anniescatalog com/knitandcrochetnow/patterns/detail html pattern_id=240
